mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_TB (userNo, userId, userPwd, userName, userGender, userAddr1, userAddr2, userPhone, userEmail, regDate) VALUES (seq_user_tb.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7}, #{param8}, #{param9})
mapper.select: SELECT userId, userNo, userName, userAddr1, userAddr2, userPhone, userEmail, regdate FROM user_tb
SELECT /*+USE_HASH_AGGREGATION*/ sido_name FROM SIGUNGU_CODE GROUP BY sido_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 1 ORDER BY sido_name
